author: BuildTheBrick
title: Not Good
review:
The legs have limited articulation because of the pot. The arms have limited articulation too, the helmet is big, OK but limits the arms.

All in All Not my favorite, but fine altogether.

author: Odeinoichus
title: Help, I've Rooted, and I can't Get out!
review:
Set #71021 Flower Pot Girl: Another cleverly dressed party guest, the Flower Pot Girl includes another unique costume element which slides in between the legs and torso covering her legs and hiding the plain brown non-printed pants.

Her torso features a bit of stem printing for the bulb which sits around her face as the head piece. This is in the shape of a daisy perhaps, I'm not 100% up on flower types, but it's a rich magenta in colour and looks very impressive. She includes two expressions, a smiling one and a nervous looking one. Or perhaps she's about to sneeze. Either way, she probably doesn't want to be next to any Bumblebee Girls.

Overall this is another fun and unique offering from this Series. I would recommend it for the parts alone, but she makes a fine addition to any Minifigure plant costume collection. Recommended.
